posts.post_content:
Interested in anything anyone may have available.  Would like to buy EPDG but would consider any back.
Most comfortable in the 2-4 range for HOFers....intact cards for anything raw.

Please PM or email to [url]galeclark74@yahoo.com[/url]

Big thanks to jcc6252 (Jim) for the Tinker Bat On and to georgiapeaches (Tim) for the Chance Batting.  Both really nice EPDGs.  Also, thanks to those that emailed.

Still open to Cubs.  Prefer EPDG backs when possible.
PM or email to [url]galeclark74@yahoo.com[/url]

Now have EPGDs of.....Tinker Bat On, Chance Batting, and Needham.

Have also purchased a Brown Hindu Sheckard

Wanting to purchase Cubs commons raw or in lower grade.  Willing to look at anything, but would prefer purchasing some non-SC and Piedmont backs.

Please PM with anything for sale.

Scans/Pics can be emailed to [url]74clark@mchsi.com[/url]

Now have: 
EPDG Tinker Bat On, EPDG Chance Batting, EPDG Needham, EPDG Reulbach No Glove, Brown Hindu Sheckard No Glove and Tolstoi Pfeffer. 

Looking for lower grade Cubs with non-Piedmont and Sweet cap backs

PM if you have any available.
